attributes.action: Ban those who enter our country illegally from receiving any kind of benefit.
attributes.additional_details: Our benefit system is precious and should be protected for UK citizens, or those who have come to our country and contributed a sufficient amount to our tax revenues over a number of years.
attributes.background: We want the UK Government to ban those who enter our country by illegal means from receiving any kind of benefits.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731719
